name: Knocker, Sapience
script:
knockareacheck = gmcp.Room.Info.num

if knockareacheck == 57174 then
  cecho("\n<white>+--------- SAPIENCE KNOCKER EXITS ---------+")
  cecho("\n<white>|     North: Morindar                      |")
  cecho("\n<white>|     Northeast: Vents of Hthrak           |")
  cecho("\n<white>|     East: Northreach                     |")
  cecho("\n<white>|     Southeast: Eastern Shore             |")
  cecho("\n<white>|     South: New Hope                      |")
  cecho("\n<white>|     Southwest: Moghedu                   |")
  cecho("\n<white>|     West: Azdun Catacombs                |")
  cecho("\n<white>|     Northwest: Beastlord Dungeon         |")
  cecho("\n<white>|     Out: Saiha'balan Grotto              |")
  cecho("\n<white>|                                          |")
  cecho("\n<white>| LOCATION GUIDE:                          |")
  cecho("\n<white>|                                          |")
  cecho("\n<white>| Sparks for tanks: NE                     |")
  cecho("\n<white>| Istar/Istarion: NE, exit wilderness      |")
  cecho("\n<white>| Tundra, Mirror Tower: N, exit wilderness |")
  cecho("\n<white>| Quick duanathar: S then OUT              |")
  cecho("\n<white>| Potash: OUT                              |")
  cecho("\n<white>+------------------------------------------+")
end
